Topic.Title: Ebay did something really really bad: But exactly is it?

Message.Msg: Once again, try selling something on eBay and come back and post your experience. You will see things in a different light once you have dealings with this shoddy company. Here's a hint... Warren Buffett (if you don't know who he is Google his name) never, ever invests in a company he hasn't done business with AND, he and Berkshire Hathaway, DO NOT hold shares of eBay. Why? because he thinks eBay is a frivolous interweb company not worth taking a long position in. Want to grow wealth, follow Berkshire Hathaway, want to lose money. keep playing games with penny ante stocks like eBay.

Flything, always the "innocent drama queen"! The publicly posted threats of violence have ALWAYS been from you and your joke of a team, simply because you're jealous I titled him Board's Best Author. You got the names wrong from the beginning, but you have cheered from the sidelines a long term terroristic cyber troll board war, which you have handily lost, while running anyone of merit away from this place. You've made no allies and your sick actions will not be forgotten in their destruction. The only thing you did do was wreck the 'report abuse' feature by deleting posts and posters, while falsely blaming another. You and you little snits are as cowardly as any bomber or terrorist and will dealt with appropriately. Meanwhile., we laugh at your public suffering. In your crazy mind did you really think my students would allow me to be attacked? I am very proud of them and I hope you get the help you and your jokes daily beg for.

I'm not worried about threats of violence, I come from a law enforcement background and know how o dial 911 if I have to. However, the purpose of this forum is to discuss eBay stock, not for personal battles. Other than participants, nobody else here appreciates the onging personal feud between these miscreants.
Give it a rest already/ Don't you have a stinking life?

There is no "Team" but just a pair of illiterates trying to fight John Osborne z50com's and Flyktning Patrick Mitchell's long ago failed board war while their guilt makes them bleat for far sterner measures with their ongoing incessant publicly posted crimes. They think they "win" by repeating false information and therefore their failed conclusions. John and Sully love to taunt those they think are dead, they laugh at the Boston victims, and they make daily threats to people here. They have for years. Yahoo simply observes them. Measures are in place to protect those they threaten. They have been neutered in life, lifestyle and business and under constant surveillance. Flything himself personally ran off Shaq and Midnite with his publicly posted threats but Shaq has returned. One needs only look at last night's Boston neighborhoods manhunt to see what is coming to the miscreants mommy's basements. Soon. Because they simply can't crawl away before their luck runs out.
